    GameObjects

      Classes in GameObjects that implement SpaceObject 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ControlledObject
      This was the previously used to controll the ship
      class  FallingObject 
      class  SimpleSpaceObject
      The simplest way to make a "concrete" SpaceObject--using the Polygon class to provide most of the behavior
      class  SpaceObjectDecorator
      This describes what a SpaceObject decorator needs to do.
      class  SpinningObject
